title: Database Configuration Schema
description: Configuration settings for the database service.

username.description: URL Builder, Username for the database. Please note that url encoding is done automatically.

password.description: URL Builder, Password for the database. Please note that url encoding is done automatically.

database.description: URL Builder, Name of database to use.

query.description: URL Builder, Additional query parameters to be passed into the query.

url.description: The full url to be used rather then broken down parts. If used all other settings will be ignored.

useDns.description: URL Builder, Boolean flag to use MongoDB dns url.
